mapper.select: SELECT S.AREACODE, S.STRCODE, S.STRNAME, S.STRADDR, S.STRTEL, S.STROWNTEL, S.STRPOSLAT, S.STRPOSLON FROM (SELECT AREACODE, STRCODE, STRNAME, STRADDR, STRTEL, STROWNTEL, STRPOSLAT, STRPOSLON FROM F_STORE WHERE CONCAT(USEYN, DELYN, GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND STRCODE != 'FS_STR_0000000001859' ) S LEFT JOIN (SELECT STRCODE, SNSRID FROM F_SENSOR_INFO WHERE CONCAT(DELYN, STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ) I ON S.STRCODE = I.STRCODE WHERE I.SNSRID = #{snsrid}

SELECT S.AREACODE , I.SNSRID , MAX(L.OCALM + L.IGOALM + L.IGRALM) AS ALMCNT FROM (SELECT STRCODE, SNSRID FROM F_SENSOR_INFO WHERE CONCAT(DELYN, STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' AND STRCODE = #{strcode} ) I LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_LOG L ON I.SNSRID = L.SNSRID WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND S.STRCODE != 'FS_STR_0000000001859' AND S.AREACODE = #{areacode} GROUP BY S.AREACODE, I.SNSRID ORDER BY 3 DESC, I.SNSRID

SELECT S.AREACODE , S.STRCODE , S.STRNAME , S.STRADDR , S.STRTEL , S.STROWNTEL , S.STRPOSLAT , S.STRPOSLON , GROUP_CONCAT(B.SEQ ORDER BY B.SEQ) AS SEQ , GROUP_CONCAT(B.STRCODE ORDER BY B.SEQ) AS STRCODE , GROUP_CONCAT(B.IMGNAME ORDER BY B.SEQ) AS IMGNAME , GROUP_CONCAT(B.IMGPATH ORDER BY B.SEQ) AS IMGPATH , GROUP_CONCAT(B.IMGSIZE ORDER BY B.SEQ) AS IMGSIZE , GROUP_CONCAT(B.IMGNUM ORDER BY B.SEQ) AS IMGNUM , GROUP_CONCAT(B.ORINAME ORDER BY B.SEQ) AS ORINAME , GROUP_CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(B.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ORDER BY B.SEQ) AS REGDATE FROM (SELECT AREACODE, STRCODE, STRNAME, STRADDR, STRTEL, STROWNTEL, STRPOSLAT, STRPOSLON FROM F_STORE WHERE CONCAT(USEYN, DELYN, GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND STRCODE != 'FS_STR_0000000001859' AND AREACODE = #{areacode} AND STRCODE = #{strcode} ) S LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM F_AREA_IMG WHERE IMGLEVEL = 'store') B ON S.STRCODE = B.STRCODE

SELECT I.PANELNAME , I.SNSRID , I.SNSRNICK , S.STRPOSLAT , S.STRPOSLON , (CASE WHEN L.DANGERCNT > 0 THEN 'WARNING' WHEN L.WARNCNT > 0 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN I.DATARCVTIME < NOW() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR THEN 'DISCON' ELSE 'NORMAL' END) AS STATE FROM (SELECT PANELNAME, STRCODE, SNSRID, SNSRSEQ, SNSRNICK, DATARCVTIME FROM F_SENSOR_INFO WHERE CONCAT(DELYN, STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' AND STRCODE = #{strcode} ) I LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT SNSRSEQ , SUM(CASE WHEN INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '2') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DANGERCNT , SUM(CASE WHEN INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '1') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS WARNCNT FROM F_SENSOR_LOG WHERE REGDATE > CURDATE() GROUP BY SNSRSEQ ) L ON I.SNSRSEQ = L.SNSRSEQ WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND S.STRCODE != 'FS_STR_0000000001859' AND S.AREACODE = #{areacode} ORDER BY 4 DESC, I.PANELNAME, I.SNSRNICK

SELECT A.BACKUPYEAR, MIN(A.MINDATE) AS MINDATE, MAX(A.MAXDATE) AS MAXDATE FROM (SELECT '' AS BACKUPYEAR, DATE(MIN(REGDATE)) AS MINDATE, DATE(MAX(REGDATE)) AS MAXDATE FROM F_SENSOR_LOG UNION SELECT '_2021' AS BACKUPYEAR, DATE(MIN(REGDATE)) AS MINDATE, DATE(MAX(REGDATE)) AS MAXDATE FROM F_SENSOR_LOG_2021 UNION SELECT '_2020' AS BACKUPYEAR, DATE(MIN(REGDATE)) AS MINDATE, DATE(MAX(REGDATE)) AS MAXDATE FROM F_SENSOR_LOG_2020 ) A WHERE #{regdt} BETWEEN A.MINDATE AND A.MAXDATE

SELECT
STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(D.SNSRRCVTIME, '%Y-%m'), '%Y-%m-%d') STR_TO_DATE(DATE(D.SNSRRCVTIME), '%Y-%m-%d') STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(D.SNSRRCVTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H'), '%Y-%m-%d %H') D.SNSRRCVTIME AS REGDT , AVG(D.SNSRKWH) AS KWH , AVG(D.SNSRWATT) AS WATT , AVG(D.SNSRVOLT) AS VOLT , AVG(D.SNSRAMPERE) AS AMPERE , AVG(D.SNSRHZ) AS HZ , AVG(D.SNSRPF) AS PF , AVG(D.SNSRIGO) AS IGO , AVG(D.SNSRIGR) AS IGR , AVG(D.SNSRIGC) AS IGC , AVG(D.SNSRREG) AS REG FROM (SELECT STRCODE, SNSRID FROM F_SENSOR_INFO WHERE CONCAT(DELYN, STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' AND STRCODE = #{strcode} AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} ) I LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT SNSRID, SNSRRCVTIME, SNSRKWH, SNSRWATT, SNSRVOLT, SNSRAMPERE, SNSRHZ, SNSRPF, SNSRIGO, SNSRIGR, SNSRIGC, SNSRREG FROM
F_SENSOR_DATA_2022 F_SENSOR_DATA_2021 F_SENSOR_DATA_2020 F_SENSOR_DATA
WHERE SNSRRCVTIME BETWEEN CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 00:00:00') AND
CONCAT(LAST_DAY(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59')) CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') ) D ON I.SNSRID = D.SNSRID WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND S.STRCODE != 'FS_STR_0000000001859' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC DESC

SELECT DISTINCT I.SNSRID , DATE_FORMAT(D.SNSRRCVTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SNSRRCVTIME , DATE_FORMAT(D.SNSRRCVTIME, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REGDATE , D.SNSRKWH , D.SNSRVOLT , D.SNSRWATT , D.SNSRAMPERE , D.SNSRHZ , D.SNSRPF , D.SNSRREG , D.SNSRRSSI , D.SNSRIGR , D.SNSRIGO , D.SNSRIGC , L.OCALM , L.IGOALM , L.IGRALM , L.LCAUSE , (CASE WHEN INSTR(CONCAT(L.OCALM, L.IGOALM, L.IGRALM), '2') > 0 THEN 'DANGER' WHEN INSTR(CONCAT(L.OCALM, L.IGOALM, L.IGRALM), '1') > 0 THEN 'WARN' END) AS STATE , (CASE WHEN OCALM > 0 THEN 'AMPERE' WHEN IGOALM > 0 THEN 'IGO' WHEN IGRALM > 0 THEN 'IGR' END) AS ALMTYPE , DATE_FORMAT(I.DATARCVTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS DATARCVTIME FROM (SELECT SNSRID, SNSRRCVTIME, SNSRKWH, SNSRVOLT, SNSRWATT, SNSRAMPERE, SNSRHZ, SNSRPF, SNSRREG, SNSRRSSI, SNSRIGR, SNSRIGO, SNSRIGC FROM
F_SENSOR_DATA_2022 F_SENSOR_DATA_2021 F_SENSOR_DATA_2020 F_SENSOR_DATA
WHERE SNSRRCVTIME
BETWEEN CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59')
> CURDATE()
AND SNSRID = #{snsrid}
) D LEFT JOIN
F_SENSOR_LOG_2022 F_SENSOR_LOG_2021 F_SENSOR_LOG_2020 F_SENSOR_LOG L ON D.SNSRID = L.SNSRID AND D.SNSRRCVTIME = L.REGDATE LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON D.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND S.STRCODE != 'FS_STR_0000000001859' AND S.AREACODE = #{areacode} AND S.STRCODE = #{strcode} AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ORDER BY D.SNSRRCVTIME DESC

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(SNSRKWH) - MIN(SNSRKWH), 0) FROM (SELECT SNSRSEQ, SNSRKWH FROM
F_SENSOR_DATA_2022 F_SENSOR_DATA_2021 F_SENSOR_DATA_2020 F_SENSOR_DATA
WHERE SNSRRCVTIME BETWEEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{regdt}, '%Y-%m'), '-01 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(LAST_DAY(#{regdt}), ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} ) D LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON D.SNSRSEQ = I.SNSRSEQ LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND S.STRCODE != 'FS_STR_0000000001859' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%'

SELECT A.CNT + B.CNT + C.CNT FROM (SELECT COUNT(D.SNSRRCVTIME) AS CNT FROM (SELECT SNSRID, SNSRRCVTIME FROM F_SENSOR_DATA WHERE SNSRRCVTIME <= CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} ) D LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON D.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND S.STRCODE != 'FS_STR_0000000001859' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ) A , (SELECT COUNT(D.SNSRRCVTIME) AS CNT FROM (SELECT SNSRID, SNSRRCVTIME FROM F_SENSOR_DATA_2021 WHERE SNSRRCVTIME <= CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} ) D LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON D.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND S.STRCODE != 'FS_STR_0000000001859' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ) B , (SELECT COUNT(D.SNSRRCVTIME) AS CNT FROM (SELECT SNSRID, SNSRRCVTIME FROM F_SENSOR_DATA_2020 WHERE SNSRRCVTIME <= CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} ) D LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON D.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND S.STRCODE != 'FS_STR_0000000001859' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ) B

(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(D.SNSRRCVTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SNSRRCVTIME , D.SNSRID , SUBSTRING(D.SNSRID FROM 9 FOR 4) SNSRIDSUBSTR , D.SNSRWATT , D.SNSRAMPERE , D.SNSRIGO FROM (SELECT SNSRID, SNSRRCVTIME, SNSRWATT, SNSRAMPERE, SNSRIGO FROM F_SENSOR_DATA WHERE SNSRRCVTIME <= CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} ) D LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON D.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND S.STRCODE != 'FS_STR_0000000001859' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ORDER BY D.SNSRRCVTIME DESC LIMIT #{pagelimit})
UNION ALL
(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(D.SNSRRCVTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SNSRRCVTIME , D.SNSRID , SUBSTRING(D.SNSRID FROM 9 FOR 4) SNSRIDSUBSTR , D.SNSRWATT , D.SNSRAMPERE , D.SNSRIGO FROM (SELECT SNSRID, SNSRRCVTIME, SNSRWATT, SNSRAMPERE, SNSRIGO FROM F_SENSOR_DATA_2021 WHERE SNSRRCVTIME <= CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} ) D LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON D.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND S.STRCODE != 'FS_STR_0000000001859' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ORDER BY D.SNSRRCVTIME DESC LIMIT #{pagelimit})
UNION ALL
(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(D.SNSRRCVTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SNSRRCVTIME , D.SNSRID , SUBSTRING(D.SNSRID FROM 9 FOR 4) SNSRIDSUBSTR , D.SNSRWATT , D.SNSRAMPERE , D.SNSRIGO FROM (SELECT SNSRID, SNSRRCVTIME, SNSRWATT, SNSRAMPERE, SNSRIGO FROM F_SENSOR_DATA_2020 WHERE SNSRRCVTIME <= CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} ) D LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON D.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND S.STRCODE != 'FS_STR_0000000001859' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ORDER BY D.SNSRRCVTIME DESC LIMIT #{pagelimit}) LIMIT #{pagestart}, 1000

(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(L.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SNSRRCVTIME , L.SNSRID , SUBSTRING(L.SNSRID FROM 9 FOR 4) SNSRIDSUBSTR , L.LCAUSE , (CASE WHEN INSTR(L.ALMFLAG, '2') > 0 THEN 'DANGER' WHEN INSTR(L.ALMFLAG, '2') = 0 AND INSTR(L.ALMFLAG, '1') > 0 THEN 'WARN' END) AS STATE FROM (SELECT SNSRID, REGDATE, LCAUSE, CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM) AS ALMFLAG FROM F_SENSOR_LOG WHERE REGDATE <= CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} AND (OCALM + IGOALM + IGRALM) > 0 INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '2') > 0
(INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '2') = 0 AND INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '1') > 0)
) L LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON L.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND S.STRCODE != 'FS_STR_0000000001859' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ORDER BY L.REGDATE DESC LIMIT #{pagelimit})
UNION ALL
(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(L.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SNSRRCVTIME , L.SNSRID , SUBSTRING(L.SNSRID FROM 9 FOR 4) SNSRIDSUBSTR , L.LCAUSE , (CASE WHEN INSTR(L.ALMFLAG, '2') > 0 THEN 'DANGER' WHEN INSTR(L.ALMFLAG, '2') = 0 AND INSTR(L.ALMFLAG, '1') > 0 THEN 'WARN' END) AS STATE FROM (SELECT SNSRID, REGDATE, LCAUSE, CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM) AS ALMFLAG FROM F_SENSOR_LOG_2021 WHERE REGDATE <= CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} AND (OCALM + IGOALM + IGRALM) > 0 INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '2') > 0
(INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '2') = 0 AND INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '1') > 0)
) L LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON L.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND S.STRCODE != 'FS_STR_0000000001859' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ORDER BY L.REGDATE DESC LIMIT #{pagelimit})
UNION ALL
(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(L.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SNSRRCVTIME , L.SNSRID , SUBSTRING(L.SNSRID FROM 9 FOR 4) SNSRIDSUBSTR , L.LCAUSE , (CASE WHEN INSTR(L.ALMFLAG, '2') > 0 THEN 'DANGER' WHEN INSTR(L.ALMFLAG, '2') = 0 AND INSTR(L.ALMFLAG, '1') > 0 THEN 'WARN' END) AS STATE FROM (SELECT SNSRID, REGDATE, LCAUSE, CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM) AS ALMFLAG FROM F_SENSOR_LOG_2020 WHERE REGDATE <= CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} AND (OCALM + IGOALM + IGRALM) > 0 INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '2') > 0
(INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '2') = 0 AND INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '1') > 0)
) L LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON L.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND S.STRCODE != 'FS_STR_0000000001859' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ORDER BY L.REGDATE DESC LIMIT #{pagelimit}) LIMIT #{pagestart}, 1000

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.DATETIME, '%m-%d') AS DATETIME , COALESCE(B.DANGER, 0) AS DANGER , COALESCE(B.WARN, 0) AS WARN FROM (SELECT CURDATE() - INTERVAL seq DAY DATETIME FROM seq_0_to_2) A LEFT JOIN (SELECT DATE(DATETIME) AS DATETIME , SUM(DANGERCNT) AS DANGER , SUM(WARNINGCNT) AS WARN FROM F_CRN_SNSR_ELEC_EVT_STAT WHERE GUCODE LIKE '30%' AND STRCODE != 'FS_STR_0000000001859' AND AREACODE = #{areacode} AND STRCODE = #{strcode} AND SNSRSEQ = (SELECT SNSRSEQ FROM F_SENSOR_INFO WHERE SNSRID = #{snsrid}) AND DATETIME > CURDATE() - INTERVAL 2 DAY GROUP BY DATE(DATETIME) ) B ON A.DATETIME = B.DATETIME GROUP BY DATE(A.DATETIME) ORDER BY DATETIME

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.DATETIME, '%m-%d') AS DATETIME , COALESCE(B.DANGER, 0) AS DANGER , COALESCE(B.WARN, 0) AS WARN FROM (SELECT CURDATE() - INTERVAL seq DAY DATETIME FROM seq_0_to_6) A LEFT JOIN (SELECT DATE(DATETIME) AS DATETIME , SUM(DANGERCNT) AS DANGER , SUM(WARNINGCNT) AS WARN FROM F_CRN_SNSR_ELEC_EVT_STAT WHERE GUCODE LIKE '30%' AND STRCODE != 'FS_STR_0000000001859' AND AREACODE = #{areacode} AND STRCODE = #{strcode} AND SNSRSEQ = (SELECT SNSRSEQ FROM F_SENSOR_INFO WHERE SNSRID = #{snsrid}) AND DATETIME > CURDATE() - INTERVAL 6 DAY GROUP BY DATE(DATETIME) ) B ON A.DATETIME = B.DATETIME GROUP BY DATE(A.DATETIME) ORDER BY DATETIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO F_SENSOR_CHECK (CHECKSEQ, SNSRID, REGDATE, CHECKSTAT) VALUES (NULL, #{snsrid}, NOW(), 'ING')
mapper.update: UPDATE F_SENSOR_CHECK SET PROCDATE = NOW() , CHECKSTAT = 'END' WHERE SNSRID = #{snsrid} AND CHECKSTAT = 'ING'
